snippet: Iran’s nuclear agency announced a step forward in spite of United Nations sanctions and measures by the United States and others to stop the nation’s atomic work.
abstract: Iran's nuclear agency says Iranian scientists have produced the nation's first nuclear fuel rod, another step forward in its nuclear program despite United Nations sanctions and international efforts to halt Iran's atomic work.
lead_paragraph: Iran’s nuclear agency announced a step forward in spite of United Nations sanctions and measures by the United States and others to stop the nation’s atomic work.

headline.seo: Iran Says It Has Produced a Nuclear Fuel Rod
headline.main: Iran Says It Has Produced Its First Nuclear Fuel Rod
headline.print_headline: Iran Says It Has Made Nuclear Rod
